title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point does not require simplification; e cos 1 sin( 1 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaadwgadaahaa WcbeqaaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaaysW7caaIXaaaaaGcbaGaci4C aiaacMgacaGGUbWaaeWaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaI0aaaaa GaayjkaiaawMcaaaaaaaa@3F6A@ is sufficient to earn the point.

The second point can be earned with an incorrectly calculated slope provided that the tangent line passes through the point ( 2,  − 7 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaikdacaGGSa GaaGPaVlaaykW7cqGHsislcaaMi8UaaG4naaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiaa c6caaaa@3D30@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point requires a correct integrand and limits of integration. Omitting the −7 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsislcaaI3aaaaa@34E2@ is considered for the second point.

The first point requires a correct integrand and limits of integration.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Setting up the equation for speed as ( dx dt ) 2 + ( dy dt ) 2 =2.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaGcaaqaamaabmaabaWaaS aaaeaacaWGKbGaamiEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG0baaaaGaayjkaiaawMca amaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRmaabmaabaWaaSaaaeaaca WGKbGaamyEaaqaaiaadsgacaWG0baaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaa leqabaGaaGOmaaaaaeqaaOGaeyypa0JaaGOmaiaac6cacaaI1aaaaa@4402@ is sufficient to earn the first point.
